document.full_text: will smith has emerged as the frontrunner to star in quentin tarantino's next film, a spaghetti western about a slave in the old south who teams with a german bounty hunter to search for his wife.
document.title: will smith is frontrunner for tarantino's next film
lines_and_colors: will smith has emerged as the frontrunner to star in quentin tarantino's next film, a spaghetti western about a slave in the old south who teams with a german bounty hunter to search for his wife.
